'''''"Battlegoat" and "Ironclaw"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend|Local Legends]] {{Enemy|Cacaua Goat|text="Battlegoat" &mdash; Brute Knight of the Iron Hills}} and {{Enemy|Flowfire Bird|text="Ironclaw" &mdash; Apex Bird of the Iron Hills}} while completing challenge conditions.
